topic: Cognitive biases affecting decision-making in renewable energy projects
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that my assumptions may be influenced by cognitive biases or limited perspectives. As a next step, I will engage in reflective journaling to systematically explore these assumptions and seek feedback from a diverse group of peers to gain different viewpoints. This approach will help me identify any flawed assumptions and broaden my understanding of the situation.

metadata.trigger: What assumption am I making that might be wrong?
